ygData.subject: Re: anyone else having problems today?
ygData.msgSnippet: Had that problem a week or two ago. Didn t resolve for two days, then I was suddenly back in the game. Tried to go through tech support. They were willing to
ygData.messageBody:
Had that problem a week or two ago. Didn't resolve for two days, then
I was suddenly back in the game.

Tried to go through tech support. They were willing to help, and had
me upload some info from my system. The problem was resolved before
they got to analysing the info, so they said they were happy all
worked out well and said goodbye.

I think maybe the customer base is expanding faster than the servers
can handle. Some of us are getting locked out because the game is
just plain full.

Barto Proudfoot
Zeb server

--- In EverQuest@y..., "Su" <suceress@k...> wrote:
> I was on EQ and got booted. I tried to get back on and it kept
getting to
> the login screen. everytime it said Error 1001 could not connect to
server.
> I tried to load the official EQ webpage. File not found.
> Hours later my mom tried on her account. Same thing.
> Then mom finally got logged in over 12 hours later. she got to
character
> select. then tried to login a character but got booted out and got
the same
> error 1001. Grrr.
> Anyone else have this problem?
> -Su
